title: Had ribbon, disappeared, received again only to disappear again
body:
So during season 4 i received a teamwork ribbon playing as a support main and after a few weeks of season 5 the ribbon disappeared.
I understand that this is because the ribbon point 'fades' as time progress' but after a week i re-gained my ribbon.
But after another week or so the ribbon disappeared so i lodged a support ticket only to get answered in copy & paste answers.
I have never left a game or flamed at team so i don't know why i lost it :(

replies.body:
You only get ribbons if you're receiving a higher-than-usual amount of honours **per game**. If this amount drops back to usual, you lose your ribbons.

They are by no means meant to have any permanency to them.

yes i know they are not permanent but losing it after a week?
they used to last longer

Well, if you exceed the threshold for gaining a ribbon, and then immediately stop getting that amount of honour per game, you would very likely lose that ribbon within a week.

Basically, what I'm saying is that ribbons are held by players who are consistently honoured, not just by players who don't rage or quit games.
